attributes.action: free the british people from being robbed for bbc1 and bbc2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Until the bbc go fully digital and shut down the analogue transmitters we are forced to pay for a license for these two channels without having the option to not bother with them. I am already on digital have the option of hundreds of channels for £10 a month, many of which i dont watch either but it is a far better value for money than the two channels i would get jailed for not paying for.
